title: Exquisite Polki Diamond Jhumka Earrings - Traditional Telugu Vaari Jhumka
features: Classic jhumka design with intricate filigree work. Features a floral stud transitioning into a tiered structure culminating in a bell-shaped jhumka. The openwork design of the jhumka is enhanced with small uncut diamond drops. Showcases the best of Hyderabadi craftsmanship.
occasions: and other special occasions like bridal showers and family gatherings. Can also be paired with contemporary Indian attire for parties and events.
description: Authentic South Indian design blending tradition with elegance. Handcrafted with high-quality materials, these jhumkas are a statement of timeless beauty and cultural heritage. The uncut Polki diamonds create a unique sparkle, while the Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine.
